com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib

Class Navigator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib.Navigator

  • public class Navigator
extends Object
    Class with several methods useful for navigation.
    Author:
    Dieter Adriaenssens

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAbsoluteDirection()
      Calculate absolute direction to current destination.
      double getCurrentBearing()
      Calculate most accurate current bearing, depending on available sensors and data.
      float getCurrentSpeed()
      Calculate most accurate current speed, depending on available sensors and data.
      AriadneLocation getDestination()
      Get destination location.
      float getDistance()
      Calculate distance to current destination.
      AriadneLocation getLocation()
      Retrieve Location.
      AriadneLocation getPreviousLocation()
      Retrieve Previous Location.
      double getRelativeDirection()
      Calculate direction to current destination, relative to current bearing.
      boolean isBearingAccurate()
      Determines if current bearing is accurate, if the current location is accurate, if previous location is set, if the previous location is recent, if the current location is not equal to the previous location and if the distance between the two is larger than the accuracy.
      boolean isDestinationReached()
      Check if current location is destination.
      boolean isLocationAccurate()
      Determines if current location is accurate, if it is set, if it is recent and if the accuracy is reasonable.

      Set destination location.
      void setLocation(AriadneLocation location)
      Set Location.
      void setPreviousLocation(AriadneLocation location)
      Set Previous Location, this should only be done to restore a previous state.

      • isDestinationReached

        public final boolean isDestinationReached()
        Check if current location is destination.
        Returns:
        true if current location is destination

      • getCurrentSpeed

        public final float getCurrentSpeed()
        Calculate most accurate current speed, depending on available sensors and data.
        Returns:
        current speed in m/s

      • getCurrentBearing

        public final double getCurrentBearing()
        Calculate most accurate current bearing, depending on available sensors and data.
        Returns:
        current bearing in ° relative to the North

      • isLocationAccurate

        public final boolean isLocationAccurate()
        Determines if current location is accurate, if it is set, if it is recent and if the accuracy is reasonable.
        Returns:
        true if location is accurate

      • isBearingAccurate

        public final boolean isBearingAccurate()
        Determines if current bearing is accurate, if the current location is accurate, if previous location is set, if the previous location is recent, if the current location is not equal to the previous location and if the distance between the two is larger than the accuracy.
        Returns:
        true if bearing is accurate
